```{r , echo=F,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
library(kableExtra)
d <- read.csv("~/Google Drive/KBO/pitchers_simple.csv")
d <- subset(d, Code == "2931", select = c(-Name, -KName, -Position, -Code))
d <- subset(d, Year > 2013)
d <- d[order(-d$Year),]
d$Team <- paste0("[", d$Team, "](/teams/", gsub("[[:space:]]", "", d$Team), ")")
kable(d, digits = c(0,0,0,0,1,1,1,1,3,2,2,2), row.names = FALSE, col.names = c("Season","Team","G","GS","IP","K/9","BB/9","HR/9","BABIP","ERA","FIP","WAR")) %>% kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"), fixed_thead = T)
```
